story:
29.10.2014

Dear Friends and Supporters, 

We are sorry to inform you that the Court of Appeal has ruled against us. For more about the judgement, please refer to the news articles below:

http://www.bloomberg.com/news/2014-10-29/singapore-s-top-court-upholds-ban-on-sex-between-men.html

http://www.afp.com/en/node/2995260

http://www.straitstimes.com/news/singapore/courts-crime/story/court-appeal-rules-section-377a-criminalises-sex-between-men-const


Please also find below a statement from Gary and Kenneth, and on behalf of the couple and the LGBT community of Singapore, we will like to thank you for your help, prayers and support. 


Statement from Gary and Kenneth. 

"We are deeply disappointed with the judgement of the Court and though it has ruled that it is beyond its judiciary function to help the lgbt community, we are thankful that the justices have taken the time to consider this appeal in detail. We hope that parliament will be able to do so as well. 

While the legal road for us has ended, we believe and hope that this case has inspired Singaporeans - straight, gay, bisexual and transgender - not to keep silent in the face of prejudice and inequality.

We have been in a loving relationship for over 17 years and this past year has been an incredible milestone for us. We decided to embark on this journey because we felt that the LGBT community deserves to be recognized as equal to the rest of society in the eyes of the law and have been witness to the discrimination and unfair treatment of the LGBT community on the basis of S377A of the Penal Code. 

Being a part of this historical campaign provided us the opportunity to show young LGBT people that there are gay and lesbi​an couples in Singapore who have weathered the discriminatory nature of our society and though we have to strive harder than heterosexual couples to be together, it can be done. We hope that we and the many other LGBT couples who are increasingly telling their stories will help others, and we hope that Singaporeans will see this as a minor setback for equality and fairness, and that we can as a country recognise the value of LGBT people. 

We would like to thank the many people who have supported us on this fight. From the many who have donated funds to the legal case, to those who have contributed their knowledge and expertise. We also thank our lawyers Deborah Barker and Peter Low both of whom have been immensely supportive during the 2 phases of our legal challenge. 

This particular journey may have ended for us but it continues for the rest of the community.

Thank you"


Update 01.04.2014

Dear friends and supporters, 

We have been informed by the courts that the hearing has been postponed to the week of 7th July. 



Update 13.01.2014

Dear friends and supporters,

After the postponement of the last hearing, we have received word that the case will be heard in the week of 7th April 2014. 

It should be relatively quiet between now and then, but keep sending across those positive energies.


----


Dear friends and supporters,

We are reaching the last stage of the challenge and our case would be heard in the Court of Appeal sometime in the week of 14th October. 

We will post another update when we find out more, and keep sending positive vibes this way!


POST-CAMPAIGN UPDATE

Thank you again for helping Gary and Kenneth raise the sum for the constitutional challenge. The funds are now with the couple's lawyers. Read about the new legal team to support the couple:

 

Jul 9, 2013 - Gay Star News

Singapore sodomy law challenge gets new star legal team

 

THE CONSTITUTIONAL CHALLENGE

Gary and Kenneth, a Singaporean gay couple of 15 years, have filed a constitutional challenge against Section 377A of the Singapore Penal Code, which criminalises sex between gay men. 

On 9 April 2013, the High Court ruled against the couple and retained the anti-gay law. Gary and Kenneth have decided to file for an appeal.

The cost of mounting a constitutional challenge adds up to a substantial figure. As friends of the couple, we are helping by raising funds for their legal challenge and seeing them through this long and difficult journey.

Related news articles:

Aug 20, 2012 - Sayoni
Section 377A challenge can proceed: Court of Appeal

Feb 14, 2013 - The Straits Times
Legal challenge to Section 377A begins in the High Court; judgment reserved

Apr 9, 2013 - Channel NewsAsia
Singapore High Court upholds criminalisation of homosexuality

 

BACKGROUND

S377A of the Penal Code states that:

"Any male person who, in public or private, commits, or abets the commission of, or procures or attempts to procure the commission by any male person of, any act of gross indecency with another male person, shall be punished with imprisonment for a term which may extend to 2 years."

Singapore is one of the few Asian countries, and the only advanced economy in the world, which still criminalises homosexuality. We believe this constitutional challenge is a rare opportunity to set things right and take our place among the many Asian and first world nations that do not have such a law.

While the Government of Singapore has said that S377A would not be proactively enforced, the fact is that is has been used, and its existence is a threat to all gay men. As it is, S377A - even if unenforced - also stands in the way of the fight against discrimination of the entire LGBT community in society, at the workplace, as well as the way LGBT people are portrayed in the mass media.

Watch: UN Secretary-General Ban Ki-moon on the criminalisation of homosexuality

 

FUNDS NEEDED

Th initial crowd-sourced target of US$50,000* (approx S$62,000) is an important milestone toward the cumulative target total of US$150,000 that is actually needed to be raised for legal and court fees (over both High Court and Court of Appeal phases). That total estimated sum of US$150,000 means that we still have some way to go before our final target is reached. As such, we will gratefully continue to accept contributions from wellwishers.

 

As we had previously stated, all proceeds will be sent to our legal team. In the event that fundraising is in excess of the expenses of the constitutional challenge, surplus funds raised online will be donated to LGBT-related causes in Singapore.

*The currency of contributions for this campaign is in USD because Indiegogo does not process SGD.

 

WHO WE ARE

We are members and allies of Singapore's LGBT community who are deeply moved by the couple's courage. Among us are individuals who are straight and gay, and we do not believe a person should be fearful of being imprisoned because of his sexual orientation.

Gary and Kenneth have bravely stood forward on behalf of all LGBT people in Singapore. Let us come together and show the couple our support.

story:
If Penguins ate Hot Sauce,

we'd all be vacationing in Antarctica...

  • Hot Sauces generally are all about heat, and flavor seems to come 2nd if at all. We want to see more creative recipes that focus on flavor as well.
  • Habanero Peppers have 357% more Vitamin C than an orange.
  • Believe it or not Hot Sauce can help battle depression. Every time you eat something hot you release happy endorphins.
  • Hot Sauce increases your metabolism which helps you eat less and feel satisfied.
  • The spiciness helps improve digestion by stimulating stomach secretions
  • The main ingredients (chiles, tomatoes, onions, cilantro) fight bacteria and act as a safe food additive that could prevent food-born illness.


A Penny today for a Hot Sauce Tomorrow

  • The Monies raised will go towards the rest of the equipment (pots, pans, bottles, labels, blenders), the first couple months at a commissary kitchen, the design of TGP website, and paperwork (retail license, certificates, testing).
  • We're offering a bunch of really cool incentives in trade for your Donation. The list is long but includes Bottles of Hot Sauce, T-shirts, Laser Engraved Wallets and Belts, and ...... Heck, you can even have a hot sauce named after you. You pick a couple key ingredients, and help with input for the label design.
  • One way and another The Green Penguin is here to stay. We're doing this no matter what, so you can count on your perks.
  • Donations made by December 11 that have Hot Sauce as one of the perks, will, upon request, be shipped by XMAS.

Unique Hot Sauce Flavors Anyone?

  • The Green Penguin is a little upstart with Big Dreams. It's a name I came up with when still in grade school. One of those, when I start a company, I'm gonna call it... The Green Penguin!
  • It represents a plethora of ideas from a community of creative people. Most of the ideas are food based but also include cartoons, weird off-beat inventions and music.
  • We're asking for some extra funds to help get the sauces completely legit and available through retail channels, ie. farmers markets, grocery stores, mail order.
  • You're helping me live my dreams of sharing interesting flavors with the world!


BIG JIMS HOT MUSTARD SAUCE

  • I just started bottling a collaboration with my Dad called Big Jims Hot Mustard Sauce. It's his ole recipe turned into a Hot Sauce, and we're making that available as one of the perks.


Thanks to everyone for taking the time to watch the video and check out the campaign!

story:
THE STORY:

Robert Daniels is a 52 year old man who underwent a double amputation of his legs over the Christmas holidays 2013. He was suffering circulatory issues that cause considerable pain and ultimately the loss of his limbs.

This is a life changing challenge that we are seeking to make just a little bit easier for him by raising funds to install a wheelchair accessible ramp to his home.

Time have been hard for many, including Robert. He had been unemployed prior to this, and has now (January 2014) applied for SS Disability. All of this takes time, however, his needs are immediate.

Your assistance in meeting the financial goal to have this need met for Robert is most appreciated. Any amount you can contribute will absolutely help. We ask that you also share this with your family and friends. We're looking for a village here folks. Thank you so much.

story:
Hi, it is me, Maureen Hayes and I am a new Elk running for Lodge 126 Mardi Gras Queen.  The purpose of the Mardi Gras Queen contest, which is a function the Elks Sweetheart Program, is to raise money to send disabled children to Elks Summer Camp, which is located in Ottine, Texas, for a week of fun.  Your contribution will afford a special needs child the opportunity to experience "camp" without the worry of their needs being met. 

Each year the Elks receive applications for summer camp from the families of disabled children all over the country but how many can be served depends on how much the individual Lodges Sweetheart Programs across the nation are able to raise. 

So please keep this in mind as you reach for your debit or credit card, knowing a happy child will be virtually saying thank you as they enjoy camp this upcoming summer.

I would like to thank all donors in advance for your generosity but even if you are not able to donate, I would appreciate it if you would share this message with your family, friends and fans by using the Indiegogo share tools...

Love,

Maureen

story:
ABOUT THE CAMPAIGN

Hello and thank you so much for taking the time to view my campaign. :)

My name is Kristina. In December, I will be joining Power Forward International Inc, (www.pfii.org) on a trip to Haiti. There, I will help run a basketball camp, where 200 children from all over the country will have the opportunity to learn the game and impress some coaches. 

Through these camps (there have been 4 to date,) 19 Haitian athletes have been "discovered" and brought to the United States schools on full academic scholarships. All these young men are great students (only those with a 3.0 GPA average are invited to attend these camps,) and have amazing athletic abilities; qualities that athletic programs in the US look for.

 Unfortunately, a large percentage of these boys don't even have sneakers or basketballs to play and learn the game. But it is so important for them to continue improving their skills since basketball may be their only way to a better future. 

Although this will be my first participation, Power Forward International Inc, has already organized 4 basketball camps and found a lot of talented young men (19 as mentioned above,) all of whom have excelled academically and in basketball in their respective institutions. 

I would really love to surprise the participants of the camp with as many pairs of new basketball sneakers and basketballs as I can. Especially that its Christmas time, too! 


WHERE THE MONEY GOES

The average price of a good pair of basketball sneakers is $80 and $30 for a basketball. 

My MINIMUM goal is to bring:

- 10 basketballs - 10x$30 = $300

- 30 pairs of sneakers - $50/pair (discounted rate) - 30x$50 = $1500

- minus $180 for Indiegogo take away fees

I am working on securing either a wholesale discount or a a quantity discount so that every dollar you donate goes as far as it can. It would be wonderful to be able to bring a new pair of sneakers to every participant and to give everyone a basketball. 

Everyone who contributes will receive:

- a break down of the pairs of sneakers and basketballs that were purchased.

- a picture of camp participants with their new sneakers and basketballs.

- a thank you note from the child your money bought sneakers and basketballs for.

- a Power Forward International Inc. rubber support bracelet.

If I don't reach my entire goal, I simply won't be able to buy as any pairs of sneakers as I would like. 

MONEY ISN'T THE ONLY WAY TO CONTRIBUTE

If you can't contribute financially, that's ok. There are so many other ways to help. Tell 10 people you know about my efforts and help spread the word. Don't forget to use the Indiegogo share tools. 


THANK YOU SO MUCH AND HAVE A WONDERFUL DAY!!!!!!!

Now! you can enjoy the unprecedented benefits of the world first and only verifiable Digital Medicine in the world today!


What is eSiddha℠ DigiMed™?

eSiddha℠ is a breakthrough online wellness service provider; delivering a very sophisticated DIGITAL mind/body wellness solutions in image and sound form, called DigiMed™.


Why choose eSiddha℠ DigiMed™?


eSiddha℠ DigiMed™ revolutionary model of wellness solutions has enabled the establishment of a new paradigm in the holistic wellness industry, allowing it differentiate itself with the following unique features:

● 24/7 ONLINE SERVICE
Available access anytime and anywhere
eSiddha℠ has transcended the boundaries of time and distance to allow wellness solutions at your reach wherever and whenever you need them.

● HIGHLY EFFECTIVE
Delivering significant & quick results
If it were not for its extraordinary efficacy, then why would we invest so much, into it?

● IMMENSELY PRACTICAL
Clear, simple and easy to use
Feel the power and simplicity of eSiddha℠ and enjoy using wellness solutions with great ease.

● INSTANTLY VERIFIABLE
Provides free trials for testing and validating on the spot!
We don’t make fancy claims but, instead, we offer concrete results to clients. Test our wellness approach on the spot and enjoy the numerous benefits.

● EXTREMELY AFFORDABLE
Paying much less for far more
We offer you our wellness solutions at the most affordable prices. Use DigiMed™ for a fraction of what you would have normally spent elsewhere.

● NATURALLY SAFE
Tolerable with no adverse side effects
Our time tested ancient wellness solutions are now digitized, automated and remain comfortably safe.


How does eSiddha℠ DigiMed™ work?

The DigiMed™ proprietary formulation process consists of: Capturing the subtle-energy signature of the wellness solution, transmitting it, then activating it into a digital geometrical and audio patterns. These activated patterns will emit the same subtle-energy with which it has been programmed, allowing it to transmit its effect into a glass of water placed within its active field and manifesting into the water the programmed potential it holds. Drinking this water will enable the user to benefit from this desired effect. The eSiddha℠ delivery process consists of: Digitizing the access of DigiMed™, charging water with the DigiMed signature, then, finally, manifesting the effect by drinking the water.


How to use eSiddha℠ DigiMed™?

A step-by-step instruction guide has been carefully set for every DigiMed™ wellness solution to show how easy to use it is:

Step 1. Register & Login to eSiddha℠

Step 2. Select & subscribe to the DigiMed™ of your choice.

Step 3. Access DigiMed™, Click & Cure! to charge a glass of water with DigiMed™ audio and image. 

Step 4.  Drink the water to fill up your energy system with the needed effect & Enjoy!



FREE TRIAL

Well, we know some of you might think that something.. 

  • Highly effective in action
  • Immensely practical to use
  • Extremely affordable to attain
  • Naturally safe with no adverse side effects
  • Available for access form anywhere at any time
  • Instantly verifiable
    •


    its too good to be true?!!

    Well, here you can check out this for your self; with our Test & Validate on the spot guarantee:

    3- CALM : https://esiddha.com/user-view-trial-product/?p_id=452

    4- BRAIN: https://esiddha.com/user-view-trial-product/?p_id=453



    IN THE PRESS

    Revolutionary Digital Medicine App eSiddha DigiMed Seeking Crowdfunding Support At Indiegogo


    http://www.nbc-2.com/story/32188980/revolutionary-digital-medicine-app-esiddha-digimed-seeking-crowdfunding-support-at-indiegogo


      

          

         

          



    DigiMed Night for sleep - Induces restful and deep sleep

    DigiMed Brain for intelligence - Boosts memory, focus and intelligence

    DigiMed Ease for relief - Soothes, eases, and relieves discomfort

    DigiMed Vigor for men - Activates masculine vitality & vibrance


    DigiMed Venus for beauty - Awakens feminine sensuality & beauty


    DigiMed Calm for peace - Calms the mind & relaxes the body


    ...And many more, yet, to come!









    ● WHAT IS ESIDDHA℠ DIGIMED™? 


    ● HOW CAN ESIDDHA℠ DIGIMED™ CHANGE YOUR LIFE? 

    ● WHAT DO PEOPLE SAY ABOUT ESIDDHA℠ DIGIMED™? 

    ● GET STARTED WITH ESIDDHA℠ DIGIMED™ NOW! 

    ● SCIENTIFIC PROOF OF ESIDDHA℠ DIGIMED™ EFFECT
    ON WATER! 



    THE SCIENCE OF eSiddha℠DigiMed™

    eSiddha℠ DigiMed™ revolutionary model of wellness services works on the following basis:
    1- The principle of subtle-energy,
    2- The principle of sound and image patterns,
    3- And the eSiddha℠ DigiMed™ principle.

    1. The principle of Subtle Energy:
    The Ancients have long known and used the principle of subtle energy for the well-being of the body and mind. Subtle energy is termed as Chi in china, Prana in India and Qi in japan. Today, many modern scientists have acknowledged the scientific basis of subtle energy and published their work to support its use. “Energy Medicine: The Scientific Basis” written by a renowned scientist, James L. Oschman, provides a scientific explanation of Subtle Energetic Exchanges in all therapies. “Life Force, the Scientific Basis” by Dr. Claude Swanson, physicist at MIT and Princeton University, is an outstanding account of Subtle Energies. “Science and human Transformation” by Dr. Williams A. Tiller, a professor of Material Sciences and Engineering at Stanford University and a proponent in the field of psychoenergetics, addresses subtle energies beyond the four fundamental forces. The International Society for the Study of Subtle Energies and Energy Medicine’s website, found at (www.issseem.org), holds a very rich resource on the subject.

    2. The principle of Sound and Image Patterns:
    The Ancients have provisioned the use of sound and image patterns, known as mantras and yantras as key instruments carrying subtle energy used for the wellness of the mind and body. In modern times, Cymatic (the study of the relationship between sound vibration and geometric shapes), pioneered by Swiss scientist Hans Jenny, has evolved to Cymatherapy. Cymatherapy was initiated by Dr. Peter Guy Manners and it uses sound and images for the mind and body wellbeing. In his book “Messages from Water” Masaru Emoto, a Japanese researcher, published his extensive work on how the mind, thoughts and emotions can change the form of water crystals.

    3. The principle of Memory Signature:
    Jacques Benveniste’s, a French immunologist who was awarded two “ig” Nobel Prizes in Chemistry, published an article in 1988 that had attracted a huge attention, mainly because it hinted at a potential mechanism that could be used to explain how homeopathy works. Just like the idea that water may somehow retain the memory of a substance that it no longer contains. So far, homeopathy uses manual methods with human intervention for its capture and transmission process.

    On the basis of these three principles, eSiddha℠DigiMed™ has revolutionized a proprietary formulation process that consists of capturing the subtle-energy signature of wellness solution, transmitting it, and then activating it into a digital geometrical and audio pattern. This innovation is a new frontier into combining modern science with ancient energy technology. This is the beginning of a revolution in the digital world where wellness solutions can be reproduced digitally.


    OUR STORY

    Sri Pranaji has made a bold attempt to revolutionize the concept of subtle energy by bringing it into the digital world, through the invention of a very sophisticated DigiMed™ proprietary process. This innovation is a frontier between methods of modern science and ancient energy technology. This is the beginning of a new revolution in the digital world, where wellness solutions can be reproduced through digital transmission.

    DigiMed™ has been under development for the last 15 years and has undergone many tests until finally, it was optimized and perfected so as to achieve wellness goals. In the early stages, this technology has faced many challenges, especially when it came to creating the digital images and audio tracks responsible for recreating energy from a mobile device. The breakthrough emerged upon successfully implanting subtle-energy into a digital image filled with audio to recreate the similar energy pattern of the intended substance. DigiMed™ wellness solutions are successful and time-tested thanks to their unprecedented effectiveness and at the same time their safeness to the environment.

    To ensure optimum delivery of DigiMed™ to clients, the eSiddha℠ breakthrough model of online service delivery, i.e, Click & Cure! has been developed to enable full access to DigiMed™, in the most convenient way possible, to anyone, anytime, anywhere. eSiddha℠ has established a new paradigm in the holistic wellness industry, mainly its incomparable features which are: 24/7 online service availability, great practicality for its clear, simple and easy to use, it’s reliable and provides customers with free trials to try and judge for themselves on the spot. The eSiddha℠ model is cost effective as it provides the best value for your money.

    eSiddha℠ enables access to a wide variety of DigiMed™ including DigiMed™ of Night for Sleep, DigiMed™ of Venus for Beauty, DigiMed™ of Vigor for Man, DigiMed™ of Brain for Intelligence, DigiMed™ of Ease for Relief and DigiMed™ of Calm for Peace. This is just the tip of the iceberg as further research is underway and will bring about even more effective wellness solutions in cutting edge Digital Medicine.

    Sri Pranaji,

    A world prominent authority in the fields of subtle-energy and siddha medicine. He has pioneered the revolutionary model of DigiMed™. Sri Pranaji is:
    ● Founder and Director of Siddha Applied Science Institutes (SASI) (www.siddhainstitute.com)
    ● President of the Siddha Varma Kalai Society Of Malaysia (www.varmamkalai.org)
    ● Founder of Pranashakty International (www.Pranashakty.org)
    ● Author of “Varmatherapy for Autism – A Parent’s Guide

    AbdalQyum Roh

     has developed the breakthrough (Click & Cure!) service delivery model of eSiddha℠. AbdalQyum Roh is:

    ● An IT professional for more than 17 years, with a Bachelor of Science in Computer Sciences; IT Projects & Services management certified.
    ● An expert researcher in the field of Digital Therapies.
    ● Founder of Siddha Complementary Alternative Medicine (www.SiddhaCAM.com).

story:
Short Summary

I suffered from Guillain–Barré syndrome (GBS) in 2009. 

Now I'm doing what GBS stopped me doing for a while: running! I'm going to run 52 races in 2015 to raise $52,000 for the awesome work of the GBS/CIDP Foundation. Please support me and follow my journey at fiftytwofives.com!

GBS affects 1 in 100,000 people. It begins with weakness or tingling sensations in the legs, and can spread to the arms and upper body. These symptoms can increase until muscles cannot be used at all and the person is almost totally paralyzed. It can be life threatening.

My experience with GBS was tough. In a few days, I went from athletic to struggling to walk to the mailbox. It took too long to get diagnosed and I didn't know where to get help -- it was mentally very tough. I couldn't look after my family, and I wasn't able to work full-time. It took me over a year to get back to even close to normal, and around two years to run again.

The GBS/CIDP Foundation is doing important work. 100% of the funds raised will be donated to the Foundation. They help make sure that people who get this rare condition are supported and educated. They're funding research, and lobbying for the right health care too.

What We Need & What You Get

Here's the plan:

  • I'm going to raise $52,000 for the GBS/CIDP Foundation, or an average of $1000 per race that I run in 2015!
  • I'm starting with an IndieGoGo goal of $10,000 for the first sixty days. Once we hit that goal, the campaign will automatically continue on towards my goal of $52,000 in 2015
  • I will count anything that has a timer as one race (one-milers, 5ks, 10ks, ten-milers, half-marathons. Heck, I might even run a marathon)
  • Every cent will go to the GBS/CIDP Foundation. You donate here, and the money goes straight to the Foundation. You'll get a 501(c)(3) tax deductible receipt
  • I'll personally pay all of the expenses associated with the fundraising
  • If you donate at any of the perk levels, you'll get a cool gift directly from me

The Impact

"The GBS/CIDP Foundation depends on our members to help raise funds for those who suffer from GBS, CIDP, and related conditions. We are excited that Hugh is running 52 races this year to raise awareness of our work and, importantly, raise money for those who need our help. We ask you to donate to his campaign and support his fundraising." -- Lisa Butler, Director of Development and Marketing, GBS/CIDP Foundation.

You will personally be helping fight a condition that affected Franklin D. Roosevelt, Joseph Heller, Andy Griffith, Alastair Clarkson, and Lucky Oceans.

You will be helping with education for those suffering GBS and related conditions. When you're hit with GBS, it can devastate your body in hours -- it's tough physically and mentally, and getting support from people who understand is critical. Knowing the GBS/CIDP Foundation was there was incredibly important in my recovery.

You can help fund research to understand more about GBS. What causes GBS isn't well understood -- it's thought that after an infection something might trigger your immune system to attack your nervous system. Today, there's no cure or treatment for GBS -- the only thing that helps sometimes is blood transfusions. We need to know more about what causes GBS, and to help those who suffer from it.

Importantly, you can help the Foundation lobby to ensure people get access to the health care they need. We need to make sure that vulnerable people aren't ruined by this condition.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some of you can't afford to contribute cash, but that doesn't mean you can't help:

  • Please help get the word out and make some noise about my indiegogo campaign -- share it on Facebook, Twitter, or another favorite social media site
  • Invite me to come and speak to your organization
  • Interview me about GBS and my campaign, and spread the word

That's it! Please join me in fighting GBS!
story_txt:
Short Summary I suffered from Guillain–Barré syndrome (GBS) in 2009. 
Now I'm doing what GBS stopped me doing for a while: running! I'm going to run 52 races in 2015 to raise $52,000 for the awesome work of the GBS/CIDP Foundation. Please support me and follow my journey at fiftytwofives.com!
GBS affects 1 in 100,000 people. It begins with weakness or tingling sensations in the legs, and can spread to the arms and upper body. These symptoms can increase until muscles cannot be used at all and the person is almost totally paralyzed. It can be life threatening.
My experience with GBS was tough. In a few days, I went from athletic to struggling to walk to the mailbox. It took too long to get diagnosed and I didn't know where to get help -- it was mentally very tough. I couldn't look after my family, and I wasn't able to work full-time. It took me over a year to get back to even close to normal, and around two years to run again.

The GBS/CIDP Foundation is doing important work. 100% of the funds raised will be donated to the Foundation. They help make sure that people who get this rare condition are supported and educated. They're funding research, and lobbying for the right health care too.   What We Need & What You Get Here's the plan:  I'm going to raise $52,000 for the GBS/CIDP Foundation, or an average of $1000 per race that I run in 2015!
I'm starting with an IndieGoGo goal of $10,000 for the first sixty days. Once we hit that goal, the campaign will automatically continue on towards my goal of $52,000 in 2015
I will count anything that has a timer as one race (one-milers, 5ks, 10ks, ten-milers, half-marathons. Heck, I might even run a marathon)
 Every cent will go to the GBS/CIDP Foundation. You donate here, and the money goes straight to the Foundation. You'll get a 501(c)(3) tax deductible receipt
I'll personally pay all of the expenses associated with the fundraising
If you donate at any of the perk levels, you'll get a cool gift directly from me    The Impact "The GBS/CIDP Foundation depends on our members to help raise funds for those who suffer from GBS, CIDP, and related conditions. We are excited that Hugh is running 52 races this year to raise awareness of our work and, importantly, raise money for those who need our help. We ask you to donate to his campaign and support his fundraising." -- Lisa Butler, Director of Development and Marketing, GBS/CIDP Foundation.
You will personally be helping fight a condition that affected Franklin D. Roosevelt, Joseph Heller, Andy Griffith, Alastair Clarkson, and Lucky Oceans.
You will be helping with education for those suffering GBS and related conditions. When you're hit with GBS, it can devastate your body in hours -- it's tough physically and mentally, and getting support from people who understand is critical. Knowing the GBS/CIDP Foundation was there was incredibly important in my recovery.
You can help fund research to understand more about GBS. What causes GBS isn't well understood -- it's thought that after an infection something might trigger your immune system to attack your nervous system. Today, there's no cure or treatment for GBS -- the only thing that helps sometimes is blood transfusions. We need to know more about what causes GBS, and to help those who suffer from it.
Importantly, you can help the Foundation lobby to ensure people get access to the health care they need. We need to make sure that vulnerable people aren't ruined by this condition.

    Other Ways You Can Help Some of you can't afford to contribute cash, but that doesn't mean you can't help:  Please help get the word out and make some noise about my indiegogo campaign -- share it on Facebook, Twitter, or another favorite social media site
Invite me to come and speak to your organization Interview me about GBS and my campaign, and spread the word   That's it! Please join me in fighting GBS!

story:
Birds like Bids!

  We are the Richmond Ravens community quidditch team and we are very excited to represent RVA and the Mid Atlantic region by competing in the USQ National Championship.  In our first year as a team, we qualified to go to Nationals and compete against collegiate and community teams from all across the country.  We are so excited for the opportunity for us to represent RVA and establish ourselves as a force to be reckoned with!   

What We Need & What You Get

The Richmond Ravens are trying to raise $3000 to cover hotels, parking, tournament fees, and incidentals for the US Quidditch National Cup 10 in Kissimmee, Florida on April 8th - 9th. We need ~$2400 for 3 days of hotels in Kissimmee, $450 for the tournament fee, and ~$80 to cover parking for the weekend. The rest will go to funding any emergency supplies, equipment, or manufacturing costs for the indiegogo.  Any and all money raised through this campaign help minimize costs for the players and the team. 

The Impact

We are a group of passionate young adults who have found a home in this crazy sport called quidditch. Since we are a community team, all of our fees come directly out of pocket from our players.  It is a heavy financial burden for us but it is something we love to do and a community we are lucky to be a part of. With every dollar, you are helping us compete, stay involved, and reach our goals. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Follow us on social media at Richmond Ravens on Facebook! We will have other promotions going on through our Facebook page. Also, be on the look out for any Richmond events or fundraisers we will have in person, where you can come meet the team or see us in action. 

Share this campaign with friends and family! 

Thank you!
